name: Rick Roll for Game Boy
description:
Make sure SOUND is ON!

You also need to click on the game screen after hitting the "Run Game" button for sound to come through. Enjoy!

=============================================

We're all familiar with Rick Rolling - i.e. a web link that sends the unsuspecting victim to the music video of "Never Going to Give You Up" by Rick Astley.

Nowadays people have memorized the URL, and will keep their defences high as you paste your sneaky YouTube link - always alert, just in case.

Well, that's where this project comes in - No one expects to be Rick Rolled on their Game Boy!

That's right, if you download the project, & write the ROM "game.gb" on to a re-writeable cartridge, you too can prank your friends in a way they never would have imagined - just ensure the sound is on!

Created with GB Studio.
